items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible, and customizable modal alert system for React ‚Äî perfect for confirmations, warnings, success, error messages, and more. It supports dynamic themes, multiple layout variants, and status-based icon rendering.

items.content_html: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies. https://www.npmjs.com/package/itstoaster
items.title: dipeshmurmu2005/itstoaster: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies.  https://www.npmjs.com/package/itstoaster

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
items.title: otaku0304/Internationalization: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications.  The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.
items.title: martinSCS/ZhEnTextFormatter: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.

items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
items.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
